info.description: GAMECUBE Disk Drive Unit Jey-Dai specs.

DvdInfo.output: Array [String File/Dir, Int Seek, Bool LidStatus (true: Open, false: Close)]

usage:
Syntax: MountIso <file>
Examples of use: MountIso C:\Isos\mygame.iso

OpenLid.help: Simulate opening of the drive cover

CloseLid.help: Simulate closing of the drive cover

MountSDK.help: Mount Dolphin SDK folder as virtual disk
usage:
Syntax: MountSDK <dir>
Examples of use: MountSDK C:\DolphinSDK

Syntax: DvdSeek <offset>
Offset (in bytes) must not be greater current DVD size.
Examples of use: DvdSeek 0
                 DvdSeek 0x2440

Syntax: DvdRead <length>
First 32 Bytes will be dumped on screen. Length must not greater 1 MByte.
Examples of use: DvdRead 32
                 DvdRead 0x1000

Syntax: DvdOpenFile <file>
path must be absolute, including root prefix '/'
Examples of use: DvdOpenFile "/opening.bnr"
                 DvdOpenFile "/gxTests/tex-02/ia8_odd.tpl"
DvdOpenFile.output: File offset in bytes. 0 if file not found.
